title: Yuck
text: I 100% agree with the other negative reviews on here. Instagram has gone down hill quickly since I started using it a few years ago, and now I only download the app briefly when I absolutely have to in order to message someone I don‚Äôt have another contact for. There is literally no upside, or benefit to having this app. It is designed to make you waste hours and hours and hours of your life ingesting yucky content that you can never fully filter out no matter how hard you try, and interacting in a very shallow way with your ‚Äúfriends‚Äù when you could be texting them, talking to them on the phone, or hanging out in person and actually building vibrant relationships. This app encourages loneliness, insecurity, and inappropriate content. Please, If you are considering downloading this app, take my warning and don‚Äôt.

title: Sweet 15 photos
text: I recently had the pleasure of booking a photo shoot with Carlos in Cartagena, Colombia, for my daughter's 15th birthday, and I must say, it exceeded all expectations. The quality of the photos was absolutely incredible, capturing every moment with stunning clarity and artistry. Carlos was not only highly skilled but also incredibly friendly, making the entire experience enjoyable and stress-free. The backdrop of Cartagena added an extra touch of magic to the photos. I highly recommend Carlos for anyone looking for a professional and friendly photographer in Cartagena.
